section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Ballard Power Systems Europe A/S is recognized as one of the leading players in the commercial application of fuel cell solutions. We are headquartered in Hobro (Denmark) and their activities are focused on three key business areas: Backup Power focused on critical infrastructure for IT and telecom industry; Technology Solutions focused on enabling their customers to solve technical and business challenges and accelerate their fuel cell programs by delivering customized, high value, bundled technology solutions; Fuel Cell bus service: The European bus service team plays a critical role in supporting Ballard-powered zero-emission fuel cell buses used in public transit revenue service on European roads. Ballard Power Systems Europe A/S was founded in January 2007 and is 100% owned by Ballard Power Systems Inc. of Canada.
relevant_communication: Projekter støttet af Horizon2020 Programmet under FCH-JU
